column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////On the other hand
column2: Common Bond's pastries are huge and reasonably priced. For just under $4
column3: I order the Pear and Earl Grey Tea Scone
column4: which has a crisp exterior and a dense
column5: cake-like interior. It's only delicately sweet
column6: which makes it a perfect breakfast scone or afternoon snack. Because of its generous size
column7: I often save half for my husband Jamie. Both of us recommend this scone.
